page.title: 19COUNTESTHORPE PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The Parish Council meets once a month to make decisions about Countesthorpe. There are 17 councillors and only the Clark gets paid,the others work voluntarily.They decide and help to pay for alterations in Countesthorpe,such as cracks in the pavement.They also help to decide much bigger things such as whether there is to be a bus route down Rosebank Road and Gwendoline Drive in Countesthorpe. Recently they decided to put two paths through the spinney which has only mud paths at the moment. {VILLAGE HALL {Though many people think the parish {council owns the village hall,they {don't.They only help to repair it.The {village hall is used for many weekly {events from slimming to Sunday School. {And also weddings,bazaars,parties,etc. { }
